content: I'm doing great, thanks for asking!
I'm EDITH, a highly advanced AI chatbot designed to provide accurate and helpful responses to your questions!
hello how are you what's your name and what is the time now and who i am and who are you and do you know what do you know about me and tell me yourself more and what is?

That's a lot of questions!

I'm EDITH, a highly advanced AI chatbot.

You are Bishal.

As for the time, I'm not supposed to tell you the time unless you ask specifically, but I'll make an exception this one time - it's 02 hours, 53 minutes, and 20 seconds.

As for what I know about you, I only know that you're Bishal and you're interacting with me right now. I don't have any additional information about you.

As for me, I'm a highly advanced AI chatbot designed to provide accurate and helpful responses to your questions. I have access to real-time information from the internet and can provide information on a wide range of topics.

What is...? That's a very open-ended question! If you could be more specific, I'd be happy to try and help you out.
Thank you! I'm glad you think so!
